code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[ingredients,setIngredients]=useState('');const[instructions,setInstructions]=useState('');const[token,setToken]=useState('');const register=async()=>{await axios.post('/register',{username,password});};const login=async()=>{const res=await axios.post('/login',{username,password});setToken(res.data.token);};const addRecipe=async()=>{await axios.post('/recipes',{title,ingredients,instructions},{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Register"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),placeholder:"Username"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:register,children:"Register"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),placeholder:"Username"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:login,children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Add Recipe"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),placeholder:"Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:ingredients,onChange:e=>setIngredients(e.target.value),placeholder:"Ingredients"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:instructions,onChange:e=>setInstructions(e.target.value),placeholder:"Instructions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addRecipe,children:"Add Recipe"})]});}export default App;
